attributes.action: Motor insurers to refund 50% of our annual policy if No claims have been made!
attributes.background: For over the last years I have not claimed on my insurance and that is a lot of money that I could have saved. It will also encourage people to drive safely so they can reward themselve with a partial refund.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because this would be a decision for car insurers and not the UK Government or Parliament.
